queries.name: Message history pagination
queries.query:
SELECT "id", "senderId", "content", "createdAt"
      FROM "messages"
      WHERE "conversationId" = '8f7a0c83-dad5-4f02-92a9-55078fef9f31'
      ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC
      LIMIT 50 OFFSET 0

queries.name: Conversation list for user
queries.query:
SELECT c."id", c."name", c."updatedAt", cu."lastReadAt"
      FROM "conversations" c
      INNER JOIN "conversation_users" cu ON cu."conversationId" = c."id"
      WHERE cu."userId" = '5b12e375-59a5-4e65-a2d2-3a4edc0d2b5c' AND cu."isActive" = true
      ORDER BY c."updatedAt" DESC
      LIMIT 25 OFFSET 0

queries.name: Message insert baseline
queries.query:
INSERT INTO "messages" ("id", "conversationId", "senderId", "content", "type", "status", "createdAt", "updatedAt")
      VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), '8f7a0c83-dad5-4f02-92a9-55078fef9f31', '5b12e375-59a5-4e65-a2d2-3a4edc0d2b5c', 'Performance test message', 'TEXT', 'SENT', NOW(), NOW())
      RETURNING "id"
warnings: No index usage detected; confirm expected execution plan.
